text:
Nurlan Utebovich Balgimbayev (20 November 1947 – 14 October 2015) served as the Prime Minister of Kazakhstan from 10 October 1997 to 1 October 1999. He was the President of the Kazakhstan Oil Investment Company from February 2002.
On 14 October 2015 Balgimbayev died in Atyrau at the age of 68, after a long battle with cancer.
